plot: A man enters a diner and orders Georgian khinkali (dumplings) and a jug of beer. As he returns from the restroom, his journey begins.
title: Unamuso
plot_es: A man enters a diner and orders Georgian khinkali (dumplings) and a jug of beer. As he returns from the restroom, his journey begins.
